sourcesContent:
import * as Tone from 'tone'

const audioSettings = {
  mute: true,
  volume: 0,
  autostart: false,
  fadeIn: 0,
  fadeOut: 0,
  loop: true,
  loopEnd: 0.7,
  loopStart: 0.5,
  playbackRate: 1,
  reverse: false
}

const audio = new Tone.Player(
  'https://tonejs.github.io/audio/drum-samples/breakbeat.mp3'
).toDestination()
audio.loop = true
player.autostart = true
